fulltext:
Curriculum Vitae 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
 Name: Nguyen Hoang Son   
 Birthday: July 16th, 1986  
 Sex: Male 
Address: 136 Ho Tung Mau street,  
        Bac Tu Liem district, Hanoi 
QUALIFICATION 
University of Science, Vietnam National University - Ho Chi Minh City 
 Program: Bachelor of Science 
 Major: Information Technology 
 Rank: Very good 
 Major GPA: 8.22/10 
 General GPA: 7.79/10 
 Thesis: Building e-paper system with Rich Interaction Application  
            technology ( Silverlight ). Point: 9.30/10 (A+) 
 Year of Graduation: 9/2008 
FOREIGN LANGUAGE 
Japanese : get Certificate Japanese Language Proficiency (N3) in 2010 
English: get Certificate TOEIC 750 in 2011 
SMM: get FPT’s Certificate middle manager in 2014 
MiniMBA: get FPT’s Certificate mini MBA in 2015 
SKILL 
Programming Language 
 Expert : Objective-C, Swift, Android, Java, Kotlin 
  C/C++ , C#, ASP.NET, PHP 
 Known: VB.NET, Javascript, Actionscript, VBA, 
               Assembly, HTML5 
Other techniques 
 Cocos2d (game engine for iphone/ipad) 
 Ajax, Web Service, XML, ADO.NET, Crystal Report 
 Testing, Encryption, Security, Cryptography, Authentication 
 Silverlight 
 Adobe Flex 
 RUP, UML 
 Flash 
 Framework, SDK 
 Live streaming video, music 
 Core reader book pdf, epub3 
Soft skill 
 Teamwork 
 Managing project 
 Ability to communicate and present seminar 
 High responsibility for work 
 Researching fast new technology 
 Adapting oneself to new surroundings 
Platforms 
 MacOS, Linix, Ubunti, Window 
 iPhone, iPad, AppleTV 
 Android devices, set top box, smartTV 
 Symbian 
 Pocket PC 
 Mobile phone (J2ME) 
  Website core service 
Database 
 SQL Server 
 Oracle 
 MS Access 
 MySQL 
 SQLLite 
Tools 
 Xcode  
 CocosBuilder  
 Eclipse, Android Studio  
 Microsoft Visual Studio 
 NetBean 
 Carbide C++ 
 SQLServer  
 PostgreSQL 
  Flex Builder 
 Flash Developer 
 Rational Rose  
 Macromedia Dreamweaver  
 Zend Studio  
 Aptana 
 Power Designer 
 Microsoft Expression Blend 
SCHOLARSHIP 
 The scholarship (money) from University with the support of Pyramid 
  Consulting Vietnam Company in 11/2007 
 The scholarship (bridge engineer training course at Yokohama and Tokyo)        
  from ISB company with the support of AOTS (Association for Overseas  
  Technical Scholarship) organization of Japan government from 11/2009 to  
  11/2010 
 One of the 3 best developers in IVC company, 2009  
 One of the 5 best managers in Vega company, 2016 
EXPERIENCE 
 6/2007-8/2007: Training in Ho Chi Minh FPT Telecom Corporation 
                           Position:  Web programmer (ASP.NET) 
 8/2008-10/2009: ISB Vietnam Company Limited (Japan) at Ho Chi Minh city 
                           Position:  Junior developer 
 11/2009-11/2010: Yokohama training center and ISB Vietnam Company  
                              Limited (Japan) at Tokyo. 
                              Position: Trainee - Team leader.  
   I joined in the bridge engineer course of        
                                             AOTS  (Association for Overseas Technical   
                                             Scholarship) organization of Japan government   
                                             This course included in Japanese and Cobol  
                                             language. 
 11/2010-6/2011: ISB Vietnam Company Limited (Japan) at Ho Chi Minh city 
                            Position:  Team Leader. 
 7/2011-11/2012: ISB Vietnam Company Limited (Japan) at Hanoi city 
                            Position:  Project manager. 
 12/2012-12/2013: CNC Company (VietNam) at Hanoi city 
                            Position:  iOS-android developer. 
 1/2014-now: Vega Corporation (VietNam) at Hanoi city 
                            Position:  Project manager. 
REFERENCE 
 Product 1: Developed company ‘s website: 
http://www.isb-vietnam.com.vn/home 
- Role: web ASP.net developer 
- Timeline: from 4/2009 to 10/2009 
- Team: 5 ASP.net developer, 2 QC, 1 team leader 
 Product 2: developed and managed android-iOS iSpreader project 
- Role: Project Manager, developer android 
- Timeline: from 7/2011 to 11/2011.  
- Team: 3 android developers, 3 iOS developers, 1 QC, 1 project manager.   
- Status: Apps removed in Apple Store and Google Play for stopping service 
- Reference: iSpreader program that was aired on VTC1 television channel   
https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=yMCjXlLDXhk 
 Product 3: developed and managed website-android-iOS Timbox-UBox 
project 
- Role: Project Manager, ios developer 
- Timline: from 2/2012-2/2013 
- Team: 3 android developers, 3 iOS developers, 3 website developers, 3 QC, 1 
project manager 
- Status:  Apps removed in Apple Store and Google Play for stopping service. 
- Reference: https://tinhte.vn/threads/danh-gia-ubox-ung-dung-chat-dua-tren-
so-thich-theo-phong-cach-meme.2182923/ 
 Product 4: developed and managed android-iOS ClipTV project 
- Role: Project Manager 
- Timeline: from 2/2014-now 
- Team: 2 android developers, 2 iOS developers, 3 QC, 1 project manager 
- Status:  Live in store. 
- Reference:  
Android app: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vn.com.vega.clipvn 
Android TV app: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vgbm.clip.tv 
iOS app: 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/clip-tv-truyền-hình-
internet/id785998054?l=vi&mt=8 
 Product 5: developed and managed android-iOS Nhac.vn project 
- Role: Project Manager 
- Timeline: from 1/2015-now 
- Team: 2 android developers, 2 iOS developers, 2 QC, 1 project manager 
- Status:  Live in store. 
- Reference:  
Android app:  
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.dudo.acmobm 
Android TV app: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=abmi.punug.tevi 
iOS app: 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/nhac-vn-âm-nhạc-mang-cảm-
xúc/id1214215216?l=vi&mt=8 
 Product 6: developed and managed website-android-iOS Waka project 
- Role: Project Manager 
- Timeline: from 6/2014-now 
- Team: 2 android developers, 2 iOS developers, 2 QC, 1 project manager 
- Status:  Live in store. 
- Reference:  
Website: 
https://waka.vn/ 
Android app:  
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.dudo.acmobm 
iOS app: 
https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/waka-4-0-ebook-
audiobook/id929027521?l=vi&mt=8 
 Product 7: Build SDK for manage user and payment in online games. 
- Role: ios-android developer 
- Timeline: from 8/2015-now 
- Team: 1 developer 
- Status:  Live service. 
- Reference:  
Website: 
https://billing.vegaid.vn/dang-nhap-vao-game/ 
 Product 8: Build core reader. 
- Role: ios-android developer 
- Timeline: from 3/2017-now 
- Team: 1 developer 
- Status:  Live service. 
- Reference:  
Core reader in app: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.dudo.acmobm 
INTEREST 
 Sport: Football, volleyball, basketball, swimming 
 Music: play drum and piano 
 Other: reading, travelling, film
